## Center for Health Data Science

In the Center for Health Data Science (HeaDS) we do both research and in the DataLab and Sandbox we develope and host course. Read more about all the cool stuff we do on our [website](https://heads.ku.dk).

## Talking HeaDS

Join us for Talking HeaDS, our engaging seminar series featuring inspiring speakers, drinks, and snacks. Don’t miss out—make sure to [sign up](https://eventsignup.ku.dk/talkingheads-nov2024) for the next Talking HeaDS event!
